instruction: Provide two examples of nonverbal communication.
output: Two examples of nonverbal communication are body language and facial expressions. For example, smiling, avoiding eye contact, scratching your head, and crossing your arms are all forms of body language which can communicate different messages. Similarly, furrowing your eyebrows, narrowing your eyes, putting on a fake smile, and nodding your head are all examples of facial expressions that can convey messages.
